title: Best of The Herd: 06/17/2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/17/2020
description:
Colin discusses Tom Brady moving to Tampa Bay and what to expect, why Patrick Mahomes is the only irreplaceable player in the NFL, why the NBA season needs to continue, more proof that Russell Wilson has surpassed Aaron Rodgers, and why the Ravens have a chance to go undefeated.

Guests: First Things First host co-host Nick Wright and former Super Bowl champion Seth Joyner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
